Articles.Content:
I guess this is a thread where you share TextureReplacer suit textures, kerbal textures, etc.

I don't have any, but I would be glad to receive some, and for people to share theirs!

Just downloaded texture replacer yesterday. I got a texture pack, and immediately noticed, bill was a blond female kerb.

i quickly changed him back to a guy, and gave him a small beard.

Just downloaded texture replacer yesterday. I got a texture pack, and immediately noticed, bill was a blond female kerb.

i quickly changed him back to a guy, and gave him a small beard.

Yeah, whenever I get one of those packs, he's always a girl...
